DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of Angeliq in Thai post menopausal women with hot flushes and other climacteric symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Tolerability of Angeliq in Thai Women
DOC.detailed_description: The study has previously been posted by Schering AG, Germany. Schering AG, Germany has been renamed to Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany. Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women with hot flushes Women with a contraindication for Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT)
